questGuideline.id: (int)This is the id of the quest (unique)
questGuideline.type: (int)This is the quest type for the quest 1 (0 gather, 1 kill, 2 delivery, 3 dialogue)
questGuideline.title: (string)This is a title for quest 1
questGuideline.objective: (string)This is the objective for the quest 1
questGuideline.quantity: (int)This is the quantity of objectives for the quest 1
questGuideline.demandingNPC: (string)This is the name of the NPC that gave you the quest
questGuideline.rewardingNPC: (string)This is the name of the NPC that completes your quest
questGuideline.rewardXP: (int)This is the quantity of XP given
questGuideline.rewardGold: (int)This is the quantity of Gold given
questGuideline.requiredId: (int)This is the quest id if quest needs that one completed
questGuideline.isCompleted: (bool)This is a true / false if quest is completed
questGuideline.status: (int)This is a number to know the status of the quest (0 inactive, 1 active, 2 completed)

quest.title: Collect 8 mushrooms:
quest.description: Go to the forest close to the beach and gather 8 mushrooms from it.
